Text: Really, truly great film, thanks dino!
Someone tell me why the audio is so low that I can hardly hear it?  Even at full volume.  I've had this problem with other movies, as well.  Thanks in advance.
You have to switch to stereo in your movie player's and/or PC's audio settings instead of 5.1. When you playback 5.1 but only use 2 speakers the volume might be low.
This film scared hell outta me when I watched it, had me in suspense, The Club Silencio scene is probably one of the best things I have ever seen in a movie.

I love this film coz its so dark and also because of Naomi Watts :)

thanks
Can someone tell me why this film is not converting in to my ps3 device on vuze??

SILENCIO
One of the greatest films ever made.

All - my comments
Print Quality - Absolutely Good. I watch it on my WD so needn't change the 5.1 stereo setting etc.
About Movie - This movie is sort of a puzzle which you muct try to decipher at the end (atleast a little) depending upon how well you have observed every frame , especially the very first frame after the credits. Watch the movie and enjoy.
Nude Scenes - Class. I like Naomi Watts...So there!.
Thanks for this print.
